fields.title: Engine Oil Update
fields.content: We added synthetic engine oils from top brands. Perfect for winter driving.

fields.title: Battery Check Campaign
fields.content: Get your car battery checked for free at our stores this month.

fields.title: Car Accessories
fields.content: Car mats, covers, and organizers now available in our online store.

fields.title: Discount on Filters
fields.content: Get a 15% discount on all air and oil filters this week.

fields.title: Winter Wiper Blades
fields.content: Check out our winter wiper blades for improved visibility during snowfall.

fields.title: LED Lights Arrived
fields.content: Upgrade your car lights with our new LED models. Long-lasting and energy-efficient.

fields.title: New Car Batteries
fields.content: Reliable car batteries for all models. Free installation in selected stores.

fields.title: Suspension Kits
fields.content: Upgrade your car suspension with our premium kits. Available online and offline.

fields.question: Do you offer installation services?
fields.answer: Yes, installation is available for select items at our service points.

fields.question: Are prices inclusive of VAT?
fields.answer: Yes, all prices listed include VAT.

fields.question: Do you provide warranties?
fields.answer: All products come with manufacturer warranties ranging from 6 months to 2 years.

fields.question: Can I track my order?
fields.answer: Yes, tracking is available in your profile after placing an order.

fields.question: Do you sell tires?
fields.answer: Yes, we sell summer, winter, and all-season tires for all car brands.

fields.question: How to apply a promo code?
fields.answer: Enter the promo code in the cart before checkout to get the discount.

fields.question: Can I pick up items from store?
fields.answer: Yes, select a pick-up point during checkout for free pick-up.

fields.question: Do you ship internationally?
fields.answer: Currently, we only ship within the country.

fields.name: Sales Manager
fields.description: Responsible for online and in-store sales.

fields.name: Mechanic
fields.description: Repair and install car parts in the service department.

fields.name: Customer Support
fields.description: Assist customers via phone and email.

fields.name: Driver
fields.description: Deliver orders to customers and pick-up points.

fields.name: Product Manager
fields.description: Add new products and manage categories.
